name: 2048! Number Puzzle Game
description:
2048 is a simple, relaxing, and rather addictive number puzzle game. The objective is to join the tiles until you reach tile 2048!

HOW TO PLAY:

Swipe to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch they merge into one.

Please provide us with feedback in the comments so we can make it the best puzzle game!

Start the fun with 2048!

Rate and Enjoy!
